page.title: 20The Pottery at Marldon
page.content: In Marldon we have a{pottery}.They get quite a few customers.The manager has been working there for seven years.He has liked pottery all his life.He employs 24 people. We asked if he liked the village.he said"Yes".The pottery makes lots of pots and they make the bases of bedside lights.Before it was this pottery the building was used by another pottery firm which made gifts for tourists. Before that it was a food shop owned by the Paignton Cooperative society,but it closed because local people prefer to go to Paignton or Torquay to buy their food in supermarkets. Visitors from the holiday camps along the Torquay ring road walk through Marldon each week and visit the pottery.
